short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free tool that hides Promoted Tweets/Posts while you browse X.com (formerly Twitter).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hate seeing the same ads over and over again? Hate Twitter / X.com ads in general? 

This tool is free, doesn't require signup, and does not track anything you do.

Blocks sponsored/promoted Tweets in several languages, as well as in-app native ads like "Subscribe to Premium" or "Upgrade to Premium+." We want it all gone.

To request new languages or customize your Twitter ad-block settings, go here:
https://github.com/ryanckulp/twitter_ad_blocker/issues/new
